adviseScripts.text: When you're cornered, forced to extreme measures for a goal,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: what's your move?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I'd always look for another solution.
I'd brace for the fallout, whatever it may be.
... Another solution, hmm?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Ideally, that would work.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: But the world is far from ideal.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Sometimes, tough calls are mandatory,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: lest you lose everything in your indecision.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Indeed.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Confronted with a dire choice,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: you need to stand ready for the ripples it causes.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: The world seldom offers us the luxury of perfect outcomes.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I have a bittersweet counseling session with D.
Someone once asked me
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: why I favor the axe
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: over the convenience of a firearm in my line of work?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Do you know the reason?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: To avoid leaving evidence.
Because missions aren't meant to be a walk in the park.
That's not it.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: The traces I leave are none,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: regardless of the tool I wield.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: That's not why an axe is my instrument of choice.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Precisely. Missions aren't all about ease.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: That was my answer to them as well.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: The axe reminds me of the mission's gravity, a burden I choose not to disregard.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I have a deep conversation with D.
To convincingly play the part of newlyweds,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I checked out a luxury apartment where Sovereigns live for recon.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: The fancy decor made it look nice at first glance.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Do you want to live in such a place?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Not really.
Sometimes I kind of want that.
I think so too.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Living in luxury seems pointless to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: What's inside you matters more than what's around you.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: But I doubt its true value.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I have a discussion with D about luxury apartments.
D comes in disguise.
What's with that look?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Is there any problem?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I just realized how beautiful my wife is.
It's odd seeing you in disguise without a mission.
Oh, Honey.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I appreciate the flattery,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: but I'm getting into character for an upcoming job.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: How about you help me out with some practice?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: This time, you're going to act as...
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I rehearse scenarios with D.
When a Sovereign moves in,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: what's their usual gift for the neighbors?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Flowers, or something practical?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Flowers.
Something practical.
That fits
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: since Sovereigns are all about appearances.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: ... So, which is more appropriate?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Genuine blooms or the everlasting kind?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Practical, huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: It doesn't seem like something a dignity-obsessed Sovereign would opt for.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I need to think about this.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D mulls over this new puzzle.
I notice a tattoo on D's arm.
What's up?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: That tattoo on your arm... What's it about?
... Nothing.
The butterfly one here?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: You seem fixated on it, despite claiming otherwise.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Are you curious about this butterfly tattoo?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: It stands for transformation, but through death.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: A personal marker for why I'm on this path.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: A constant reminder to myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: You get it, right?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with D about tattoos.
Honey.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: My husband?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: ... Too formal, isn't it?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D is lost in thought.
What's on your mind?
Honey works fine.
I'm working out how to address you during the mission.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: It'd help me act more naturally.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Any suggestions?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Being too formal might look weird for us.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Good call, Honey.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: ... Yeah, that's better.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I sort out nicknames with D.
Here, take this.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D hands me a heavy bag.
Check it out when you're on your own.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: ... Got it.
... Nothing dangerous in here, right?
It's full of disguises.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: You'll need to get a feel for them before we get going.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Remember, a good disguise is half the battle.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Practice with them in front of the mirror until it feels right.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Dangerous?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I don't know what's running through your head,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: but it's just full of disguises, nothing dangerous.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: The reason I said to check it alone
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: is to keep the mission under wraps.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Sorry if I wasn't clear enough.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I learn more about disguise from D.
On weekdays... we do this... and on weekends...
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D is writing something down.
I think it's crucial we have our story straight before the mission,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: so I'm putting together the backstory for our cover personas.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: The paper is brimming with all sorts of backstories.
Is it necessary to be so detailed?
I'll make sure to memorize as much as possible.
Without a solid story,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: we're bound to slip up.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: We can't let some minor mistake blow our cover.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: So, tough as it is, you need to commit every detail to memory.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Please do your best.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: It's essential for the mission
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: that we know our cover as well as our own lives.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I work hard to memorize what D wrote.
It's time for our session, but D is nowhere to be seen.
*Zing*
Honey, what do you want for dinner?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Anything you make is good for me.
I've already eaten, actually.
Good.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Not the response I'm expecting,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: but still works.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh*
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Remember to always stay in character, no matter the circumstances.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: That's how we avoid slip-ups during a mission.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Here, study these menus.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: If you can't improvise, at least memorize them.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: She hands me a list of dishes.
I receive an acting lesson from D.
It's time for our session, but D is nowhere to be seen.
*Zing*
You're back, Honey! How was your day?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: It's been a long day. What about you?
Erm... I actually just sat around all day.
Hehe, I've been awaiting your return.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: That doesn't feel quite right. Perhaps...
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Honey, I'll go wash up first.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: This sounds more natural for newlyweds, don't you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I'm not entirely sure about this role, so just go with it.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh*
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Remember to always stay in character, no matter the circumstances.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: That's how we avoid slip-ups during a mission.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Here, study these lines.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: If you can't improvise, at least memorize them.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: She hands me a paper with several lines of dialogue.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D and I act out a scenario as newlyweds.
It's time for our session, but D is nowhere to be seen.
*Zing*
Honey, is there something you want for our anniversary?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Just some downtime.
How about you? What would you like to have?
D puts her hand on her axe.
I-I mean, downtime with you, of course.
... Next time, you'd better prepare a better answer.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Answering a question with a question. I like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: When caught off guard,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: turning the tables with a counter-question can be a clever tactic.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Even so, you should always have an answer ready too.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I crafted the backstory for our anniversary with D.
It's time for our session, but D is nowhere to be seen.
*Zing*
Out of nowhere, D comes dangerously close to me.
Honey,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: what's with the red stain on your shirt?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: H-huh? Red stain? Where?
Oh, that? I must have spilled wine on myself.
Could it be lipstick from another woman?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I guess we're done here.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D slaps me on the cheek.
Wine, you say?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D puts her hand on her axe.
Yeah, we had wine together yesterday, remember? I must have spilled some at that time.
Oh, that's right.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D relaxes her hold on the axe.
Give me your shirt, Honey. I'll wash it right away.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I have a terrifying time rehearsing as newlyweds with D.
It's time for our session, but D is nowhere to be seen.
*Pitter-patter*
It's raining.
*Zing*
D comes in completely soaked by the rain.
... Can you give me something warm?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I'll make you some coffee.
Everything all right?
... Skip the sugar.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: That way, it'll help keep my mind sharp.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Just black and bitter.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: ... I'm fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: At least, the rain is quite nice.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Mind making me a warm cup of bitter black coffee?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: With that, D and I sip our coffee in silence.
*Squirm* *squirm*
D's squirming bag keeps bothering me.
You seem fixated on my bag.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D stares at me quietly.
N-not really.
What's in it?
*Sigh*
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: You might as well know.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: This is...
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D places the bag before me.
It's a trend amongst Sovereigns,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: as evident from its distinctive logo...
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Just take a look for yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D opens the bag she's carrying.
Makeup, wallet...
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: It's all the popular luxury brands among the Sovereigns.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: ... It's so full that it just won't stay shut.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I learn more about luxury brands from D.
In the end, I didn't get to hear about what I was curious about.
What's our move if the target figures out we're in disguise?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Stop the mission, right?
Take the target down?
Exactly.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: We'd have to stop the mission, unfortunate as it is.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: We need to investigate the facts,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: and only then can we make a move.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Wrong.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: The right call is to stop the mission.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Keep it in mind that it would be unwise to make any move
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: without investigating the facts.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I have a serious counseling session with D.
When I'm in the guise of another, I sometimes ponder
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: what it would be like to escape this mission and lead that fabricated existence.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I've thought about that, too.
But that's not you.
It's tough work, and the idea of something simpler is tempting.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Still, I've got my responsibilities,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: so I can't just quit.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: That'd be like shirking.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: ... You're right.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: With the responsibilities I have, I must stick to the mission.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: No cutting and running.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with D about the weight of the responsibility.
To help you better get into character,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I'm thinking of dressing in styles that you like.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: What would you like me to wear?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: A maid uniform.
A dress.
Oh.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: That's what you like, huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: ... Got it.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D shoots me a despising look.
Nevermind, I'll decide for myself what to wear.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Since I'm wearing a bodycon dress,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I should search for a light, airy dress.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Thanks for the idea.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: D and I start picking out clothes together.
What do you think about trust?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: It's not something you can always rely on.
It's something you can depend on.
Yeah, I agree.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: In the end, when things get real, you've only got yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: You can't just depend on others.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Not for me.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: If you depend on it too much and when reality hits,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: you might fall.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Trust is fine,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: but depending too much on someone else is risky.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with D about trust.
Sometimes I wonder,
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: how should we break
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: the cycle of evil?
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Track down the root of the evil and destroy it.
Make sure whoever does wrong pays for it.
That's a valid point.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Nevertheless, I question its feasibility in reality.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: ... That's true.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: Ensuring they get what they deserve
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: is probably the most I can do.
adviseScripts.speaker: D

adviseScripts.text: I have a serious counseling session with D.
